article:
My name is Dave. I'm an 18-month-old _ . Alan and Tina are my owners they love me, but they always _ me alone at home when they go bike riding. Do they like it more _ me? Though I know they have their own hobbies, I hate the feeling of being lonely.
Last night, _ I was lying on the floor and watching outside, Alan and Tina rushed in. Alan shouted, " Hi, Dave! Look! We have _ news for you. We bought a new bike with a sidecar . From now on, you'll be able to go bike riding with us. We also _ something for you! " Alan took out a special dog hat, clothes and a pair of _ from his schoolbag. " They can protect you from the wind and sun when you are travelling with us. And you don't _ to stay at home alone any more," Tina said. Then she helped me put them on. They both thought I was cool in the hat and the sunglasses.
Now I'm sitting by their side on the  _ . I'm so excited!
